description: implement in-depth SQL Server monitoring to ensure that the instances are optimized, healthy, and available

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sqlserver")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_server_properties")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "db_online" or r["_field"] == "db_recovering")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

include: db_recovering {database_name="master", hardware_type="HYPERVISOR", host="60afee03e932", name="sqlserver_server_properties", sku="Developer Edition (64-bit)", sql_instance="RABBMHVSG3:SQLEXPRESS", sql_version="14.0.2042.3"}
